scene_description_enriched: A haloed figure, likely Christ, stands to the left, holding a globe-like object. The figure is dressed in a long robe and appears to be interacting with a circular depiction of a body of water filled with various aquatic creatures and birds. Within this circle, fish swim, ducks and geese are present, and a swan glides. Birds also fly above the water. The background is decorated with an intricate, swirling pattern. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
